source.name: NFT Applications in Various Industries
source.instructions: Consider the following statements about NFT applications. Which of these statements are accurate? Select all that apply.

answers.answer: NFTs can be used to represent ownership of virtual land in blockchain-based games
NFTs are ideal for creating fungible in-game currencies that can be easily divided and exchanged
NFTs can be used to tokenize real-world assets like real estate, potentially increasing market liquidity
NFTs are primarily useful for digital art and have limited applications in other industries
NFTs can be used to create verifiable digital identities for secure access to online services

source.guidance: This question assesses the understanding of NFT applications across various industries. The correct options highlight the versatility of NFTs beyond just digital art. NFTs can indeed represent virtual land ownership in games and tokenize real-world assets like real estate, potentially improving liquidity in these markets. They can also be used for digital identity verification. The incorrect options include using NFTs for fungible currencies (which is not appropriate as NFTs are non-fungible) and limiting NFTs to just digital art (which understates their broad applicability). Understanding these diverse applications is crucial for grasping the full potential of NFT technology in different sectors.
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT analyze and evaluate potential applications of NFTs across different industries
